A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie has beautiful photography from the beginning to the end\, but to me the main plot (running out of fuel) was very Saturday morning cartoon\, very TV episode\, not for a big screen blockbuster as Star Wars. I wanted to finally see Luke and Leia (since Han was killed) go in a big and fun adventure together like the OT\, but it never happened and it never will\, waste of great characters! The movie that splitted the fans in two.
